PYPI Release Notes 0.1.2

Smeagol is a simple Python wiki designed to be compatible with Git wiki 
repos.

SECURITY WARNING
This early release (version 0.1.2) is not fully functional. There are several 
known bugs and security issues that need to be addressed before version 1.0. 
This initial release is intended to be run in controlled or isolated 
environments. 

KNOWN ISSUES
Known issues will be documented at https://github.com/josh-kaplan/smeagol/issues
